name: Fractured (BaldursTh)
description:
Fractured is a run-and-gun 2D platformer where a fracture in time occurs and you find yourself holding an m16 in the medieval era. Every time you shoot your gun, time begins to fracture as the timeline begins to warp. The more you shoot your gun, the more fractures will occur. Choose your shots carefully, or else your timeline with fracture into oblivion! 

Playthrough:


Controls:

Run Left: A

Run Right: D

Dash: Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Shoot: Right Click

Drag Error: Left Click

NOTE:

There was a bug fix made to this game after the deadline. It fixed the menus not working correctly.
